reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A weekend away at the Fitzroy Inn did not disappoint. We had a massive room in the new section of the property which was really nicely laid out, with a comfy bed and high quality linens. I was kinda expecting olde worlde stuff which can sometimes be a bit tired, but the quality of the furnishings was excellent. The only downside was the tiny tv, but then again on a weekend away in such a lovely place with one's partner, tv should not be required!! We ate dinner at the Inn and that was good, with nice wine and all was reasonably priced. Breakfast was sumptuous and served in the kitchen by the friendly hosts - quite a nice touch. I will definitely be going back to the Fitzroy Inn, its so close to Sydney but is also worlds away.
reviews.title: A quality retreat in the country, on Sydney's doorstep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Historic building in beautiful gardens - friendly hosts - huge, warm comfortable rooms. Stayed in the new building, which has been built to blend in well. This would be a lovely place for a group or family get-together.
reviews.title: Lovely historic inn

reviews.text: We only stumbled onto Fitzroy Inn after making a last minute decision to forego snowy mountains. Instead we wanted to drive straight into blue mountains from narooma but we had to stop one night along the way and we chose mittagong. at the tourism info office, the lady recommended fitzroy inn. we decided to check it out, and once we looked at the room (at the new wing), we knew we would stay the nite.
reviews.title: Loved everything

likes.liked: — great personal services from the owners
likes.disliked: — only gripe is that the mirror in the bathroom was so high. perhaps i'm too short.

reviews.text: The spa suite room was very spacious, done up spartanly all in white, except for a surprising blue boat with oars propped against the wall. The spa tub was squeaky clean and really there was no question of not using it. it was great sitting and enjoying the jets and feeling relaxed.
reviews.title: good brekkie

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were charmed by Maria's warm welcome (together with her delightful small dogs). She was very helpful when we approach her about heating. she turned on the heater for us and gave us another portable heater incase the central heater didn't work.
reviews.title: a beautiful little hotel with delightful hosts.......

likes.disliked: — no TV in some of the rooms
